data.comment: The match is underway in Seville.
At Benito Villamarin, Elche are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 1, Betis are coming forward and Emerson gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
David Medie Jimenez awards Elche a goal kick.
Free kick for Betis in the half of Elche.
In the minute 2, David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Betis.
Throw-in for Betis in the half of Elche.
Betis's Antonio Sanabria misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 4, It's a goal kick for the away team in Seville.
Elche awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 5, Elche have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Elche at Benito Villamarin.
Free kick Betis.
In the minute 7, Goal! Betis have got their heads in front thanks to a Antonio Sanabria strike.
Cristian Tello with an assist there.
Throw-in for Betis in their own half.
In the minute 9, Cristian Tello gets his shot on target but fails to score for Betis.
Throw-in Betis.
Gonzalo Verdu for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 12, Nabil Fekir (Betis) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Cristian Tello for Betis gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Elche at Benito Villamarin.
In the minute 14, David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Elche in their own half.
Can Betis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Elche's half?
Guido Rodriguez for Betis drives towards goal at Benito Villamarin. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 17, David Medie Jimenez signals a Betis throw-in in Elche's half.
Throw-in for Betis close to the penalty box.
Betis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Betis in their own half.
Ball safe as Elche is awarded a throw-in in their half.
David Medie Jimenez awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 26, Betis pushes forward through Antonio Sanabria, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Elche at Benito Villamarin.
It's now 2-0 in Seville as Cristian Tello scores for Betis.
In the minute 29, Sergio Canales instrumental with a fine assist.
In Seville Betis drive forward through Antonio Sanabria. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Betis drives forward and Nabil Fekir gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 32, Ball goes out of play for a Elche goal kick.
Throw-in Elche.
Elche to take a throw-in in Betis territory.
In the minute 34, In Seville a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Elche awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Betis in their own half.
In the minute 37, Betis's Emerson gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Elche defender.
Corner awarded to Betis.
Elche needs to be cautious. Betis have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 38, Betis have a dangerous throw-in.
Betis's Joaquin breaks free at Benito Villamarin. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Elche at Benito Villamarin.
In the minute 41, David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Betis.
Juan Sanchez Mino for Elche has been booked by David Medie Jimenez and receives a first yellow card.
Emerson is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 43, Ball goes out of play for a Elche goal kick.
Free kick Betis.
David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Betis in their own half.
In the minute 45, Penalty! David Medie Jimenez points to the spot, great chance for Betis...
Nabil Fekir (Betis) has missed a penalty!
Betis's Emerson is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 45, Can Elche get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Betis's half?
David Medie Jimenez blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Miguel Cifuentes is replacing Juan Sanchez Mino for Elche at Benito Villamarin.
David Medie Jimenez awards the home team a throw-in.
Betis's Nabil Fekir gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 50, Elche have a goal kick.
Elche are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Free kick for Elche in their own half.
In the minute 51, At Benito Villamarin, Nabil Fekir has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Elche push upfield but David Medie Jimenez quickly pulls them for offside.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seville.
Great finish from Cristian Tello to give Betis a 3-0 lead.
In the minute 56, Great play from Sergio Canales to set up the goal.
Josan puts the ball in the net and reduces the deficit to 3-1.
In the minute 60, That's a fine assist from Fidel.
Elche awarded a free kick in their own half.
Betis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Elche in their own half.
Antonio Sanabria (Betis) gets a yellow card.
William Carvalho is on a sub for Joaquin for Betis.
In the minute 67, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Elche will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Betis.
Betis's Aissa Mandi gets in a shot on goal at Benito Villamarin. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 69, David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Elche in their own half.
Throw-in for Elche in the half of Betis.
Can Elche capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Betis's half?
In the minute 73, David Medie Jimenez signals a Elche throw-in in Betis's half.
The away team have replaced Ivan Marcone with Omenuke Mfulu. This is the second substitution made today by Jorge Almiron.
Jorge Almiron is making the team's third substitution at Benito Villamarin with Emiliano Rigoni replacing Josan.
In the minute 74, Elche make their fourth substitution with Nino replacing Lucas Boye.
Betis to take a throw-in in Elche territory.
In the minute 76, In Seville a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Manuel Pellegrini (Betis) is making a second substitution, with Victor Ruiz replacing Marc Bartra.
Free kick for Elche in their own half.
David Medie Jimenez awards Betis a goal kick.
In the minute 80, Elche have been awarded a corner by David Medie Jimenez.
Miguel Cifuentes of Elche gets in a strike, but is off target.
Betis have a goal kick.
In the minute 81, Manuel Pellegrini is making the team's third substitution at Benito Villamarin with Diego Lainez replacing Nabil Fekir.
Victor Rodriguez is replacing Raul Guti for Elche at Benito Villamarin.
Ball safe as Elche is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 82, David Medie Jimenez signals a free kick to Betis in their own half.
Throw-in Elche.
Ball safe as Betis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 87, David Medie Jimenez signals a Elche throw-in in Betis's half.
Throw-in high up the field for Elche in Seville.
At Benito Villamarin the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
The match has come to a close in Seville. The final score is 3-1.
